headline.print_headline: Stolen Dutch Art Has Been Recovered
headline.main: Ukraine Says Stolen Dutch Art Has Been Recovered

snippet: The four paintings that were retrieved have a total value of about $280,000. They were among 24 works of art and 70 pieces of silver taken in a nighttime burglary at the Westfries Museum in Hoorn, the Netherlands, in 2005.
abstract: The four paintings that were retrieved have a total value of about $280,000. They were among 24 works of art and 70 pieces of silver taken in a nighttime burglary at the Westfries Museum in Hoorn, the Netherlands, in 2005.
